reviews.title: Very beautiful dishes!
reviews.review_text: I was really torn between two sets of Pioneer Woman's dishes. These are just the perfect ones and was glad I made this decision. I ordered complimentary dishes such as bakeware. I ordered the 9 X 13 dish but it came in broken as it wasn't packed very well. I reported it but no one has replied.

reviews.title: Good buy!
reviews.review_text: To be honest, I was pleasantly surprised when I received this rug! I didn't expect much because of the really good price, but this rug is exactly as pictured. Super happy with my purchase and rug looks beautiful i didn't expect much because of the really good price, but this rug is exactly as pictured. Super happy with my purchase and rug looks beautiful!

reviews.title: Finally A Rug That Goes With Our Other Orientals!!
reviews.review_text: We love this style design in rugs but they are hard to find. We got the brown distressed in round for under our round dining table. So beautiful. Soft and supportive feeling. Happy find for sure. Measure the space you want your size in first. Ours fit perfect beacuse we did that.

reviews.title: Great value for the price
reviews.review_text: The softness of the rug is great. Wish it was a little less distressed in color but overall very pleased. Liked it so much that i purchased a runner in the same color. Still trying to get some of the creases out. Used a steam iron and that worked pretty good but still having issues.

reviews.title: Surprisingly soft and looks great!
reviews.review_text: This came quickly and was in perfect shape. It was folded up into a smaller box, so there were some strong creases in the rug, but we put some heavy items on it and it has settled down. I am really surprised that a rug at this price looks and feels so good.

I have already recommended this rug to several family members and friends. I was surprised by the quality, thickness and softness. My toddler wouldn't stop talking about how soft the rug was compared to our old one and they aren't wrong. The rug does seem more blue than black but that works for our space anyway. The fact that it's washable is just an added bonus.

This rug is incredible for the price and what I need it for. I have a German shepherd who is always getting things dirty or ruined. This rug feels more like a fleece blanket with a rubber back than a real carpet but this is truly perfect for a house with pets. It looks high end! Pet hair doesn't get stuck in it and it's easy to clean.

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.review_text: This area rug is absolutely beautiful. I purchased 2 the green and gray. I like that they have a rubber back safer for walking on. They both are want I have been looking for my door ways. Great price for a beautiful rug!

i didnt read that it was washable, which means thinner than a nornal rug, but carpet stickers help. Make sure you have a good carpet setting on your vacuum also or it will suck it up. The rug is so soft, like a new blanket and so pretty.

reviews.title: So adorable and trendy
reviews.review_text: I was very hesitant at first but it grew on me. The only issue I had was that the print looked a little pixelated with the 9 x10 size. However, the colors are great and vibrant! the runner is also very adorable super trendy and soft. overall good quality

The color is gorgeous and I love the vintage look!!! Took away one star for design because it looks slightly pixilated/you can see the lines where the design was printed but not super noticeable unless you look for it.

I love it! And it's true to color. Not sure where folks are seeing green tones. My only complaint would be that I wish it delivered rolled up rather than folded. It came quite wrinkled. Not sure how to remove the wrinkles.

reviews.title: Misrepresentation of product on website
reviews.review_text: Not even close to what it looks like in the picture! Very disappointing and sad because it's not the first item that was completely different from what was advertised and seen on the website.
Packaging is great and it's a good addition to my work space especially to help stop my work chair from rolling around on bare floor and it's really cute. * I only just expected it to be thicker.

reviews.title: Pretty green, pretty pattern, soft and sturdy
reviews.review_text: I bought this for the kitchen in front of the sink because the floor gets wet when I'm doing dishes. the green color is very pretty, it feels very nice and soft under my feet. it's thin so I might padding to make it feel even better. I'm happy with it, I like pretty patterns instead of just boring solid colors. looks good, feels good, serves its purpose. I haven't washed it yet but in my years of experience washing household items I'm sure it will stand up to machine washing very well. I'd would purchase again.

reviews.title: Will definitely buy more!
reviews.review_text: I've bought three of these rugs for my kitchen %26 entryway and I love them! They're just lovely, reasonably priced, feel like walking on velvet and stay in place even when my neighbor rode on them in his mobility scooter. I plan on buying more for other rooms.

reviews.title: Don't Follow Package Instructions
reviews.review_text: Took the rug out of the packaging and followed enclosed instructions to put it in the dryer on high heat for 10 minutes to get the wrinkles out. Now my dryer is full of little white balls (small pieced of the rubber backing??) and the rug is still quite wrinkled. Would love to know how to get the worst of the wrinkles out because other than that it is a pretty rug.

reviews.title: Washable Beautiful Rug
reviews.review_text: This rug is beautiful. The rug is the 1st thing people notice walking into the room. Shipped folded and didn't have any problems with creases when laying it down.

rug very pretty and soft to touch. my feet love the feel. the only thing I was surprised was how thin the rug is. it almost feels more like a tapestry. i am very satisfied and would buy again. Delivery was perfect.
Love this rug! The colors are beautiful and look vintage. very soft and feels good to walk on. Laid flat quickly. I would definitely recommend this gorgeous rug!
more like a door mat than a rug. works ok at the front door entrance, not so much in front of hearth. expected something with a little pile to it. it will work until I find something more suitable.
The rug is pretty, but you cannot vacuum it. The vacuum, put on bare floor and the vacuum still trys to vacuum up the rug. Otherwise looks well inside my front door.

reviews.title: Fits perfectly
reviews.review_text: I have this rug in my entry area. It seems durable, comfortable to step on, and I like the fact it will be washable. I am very happy with the coloring of this rug. It's not too light and it's not too dark.

This is a fantastic area rug for the money! And, although I did not remember it saying so, it does not have fringe, which was gteat for me because I was filling a smaller space. It is very light weight and lays perfectly flat. I really liked that too! And, when you walk on it barefoot, it is wonderfully soft!. Your cats will love it too! ....Highly recommend it!

reviews.title: shipping fine, quality stinks!
reviews.review_text: the rugs are really flimsy. and there is some sort of coating on them that is making my shoes slip all over the house. would not recommend. I already opened them and placed them overtop of the old rug for extra padding. really cheap and really not worth it!

reviews.title: Great value, appearance, and quality.
reviews.review_text: This is so soft. wasn't too hard to get the creases out. Goes perfect in the living room. Definitely doesn't slide which is great with two dogs. Our little dog loves laying on it cause it's so soft. Ordered a bigger one in a different color for the family room because we liked this so much. Great value.

reviews.title: The quality is not there
reviews.review_text: This rug is so thin… I put it over existing carpet and it just moves. It's it's not what I'm looking for but it's very soft. I'm gonna have to Velcro it down. I wish I knew how thin it was. I wouldn't have bought it. I mean for the price it's it The qualities not there.

reviews.title: Beautiful Vintage Style Neutral Rug!
reviews.review_text: I was very hesitant about purchasing a washable rug. "If it's washable, it had to be as thin as a blanket." Wrong!! In fact, it wasn't too thin at all! It isn't as thick as most area rugs but it's thickness is perfect. I love it so much, that I would love to go a size bigger than the 9'x12' that I purchased. I purchased the brown vintage style, that looks distressed in color and pattern. It's covered in florals, and very neutral. It is so soft to the touch, and absolutely beautiful! There is not one thing I would change about this rug, even if I could. Down the road, if this same rug is still available, I will be purchasing a size bigger, and I have the runner for my hall, in my cart. The browns, white, and cream colors fades in and out with the length of your rug. Distressed is a perfect word for this rug. If you're looking for farmhouse, vintage or neutral, this is it. It's beautiful! It's vintagey. It's perfect!

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.review_text: The picture is very deceiving. The design is just printed on the top so when the fibers go to either side you can see the white of the fiber peaking through. Not really worth what you payed for when you can get a similar quality washable run on Amazon for less
the delivery process wasn't that great but the rug made up for the lack of it....looks great in the family room

reviews.title: It looks nice, but...
reviews.review_text: Very nice appearance, but thinner quality that expected. The rug moves to easily., rubber backing does not grip well
The rug is of high quality ! The price is right! The green is the perfect shade of green. Looks great!
I bought this runner for our camper, color is great soft on your feet and it lays very flat. Not to mention it fits the kitchen area perfectly.
color was not as bright green which was great. to me actual color was a darker more muted coloring, very pretty

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.review_text: The rug is a beautiful rug. The only thing I wish it would've been a 5 x 8 instead of 5 x 7, but I still love it.
It is faded and very cheap looking. Didn't like. But if you need something to cover your floor this will do.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: Just got it today and so far really love it! Very soft and the color looks like the picture. Just what I was looking for. It's thin and lightweight!
Just what I was looking for like two just what I was looking for bought two from Amazon not satisfied from Amazon not satisfied

reviews.title: Very pretty
reviews.review_text: I like the fact I can wash them in my machine Looks like a bargain! Very pleased with the purchase.

reviews.title: Luxury rug at pennies on the dollar!
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and pattern, doesn't overpower the room. It feels so soft under our feet. I can't wait to watch the grandchildren playing on it at their next visit!

reviews.title: Beautiful rug and can't get over this rug..
reviews.review_text: texture is very soft, color is exactly as described in the website, non slippery at all, easy to vacuum and easy to remove any stain could cause by you..i wish i can buy another one and keep it as spare..gorgeous rug

reviews.title: Great price, great value
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this. Very soft. Works great in the family room. Threw in the dryer for 10 minutes and then rolled it up. Unrolled it the next day and it was nice and flat.

reviews.title: Love these rugs!
reviews.review_text: I bought two and I just love how they look. I was concerned the rugs wouldn't look as good when I got them, they succeeded expectations. They are so soft and comfy to walk on.

reviews.title: So so decent rug for the price
reviews.review_text: Very soft. Not as sturdy as I thought it would be.Serves the purpose but doesn't have the strong back you would expect. I can't imagine it lasting longer than a couple seasons

reviews.title: Soft rug
reviews.review_text: Soft and good condition so far! It moves around a little and wrinkles but for the price you can't go wrong.
Didn't like the wrinkles and the thinness of the rug. After a few months the wrinkles have gone away. Loved the pattern and colors.

reviews.title: Great rug!
reviews.review_text: I put it in my bedroom because we have all wood flooring. Love how it feels on my feet when l step out of bed. Colors are great too.Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Lovely!
reviews.review_text: Excellent rug! Looks greatness my farmhouse kitchen. Extremely soft. Navy not black, which is better with my navy cabinets.
The rug was perfect. Color was as shown, looks great in our living room. Delivery was sooner than expected. I highly recommend this rug.
Awesome quality great price I would definitely recommend and would definitely order in a different color

reviews.title: Beautiful rug; better price
reviews.review_text: Such a soft rug, not very dense but an incredible design. It's a runner in our main hallway and is in great condition after months of traction
The rug is very nice and fabric is soft to the touch. The rubber backing is sufficient for my floors.

reviews.title: BERTHMEER 4'x6' Vintage Oriental Distressed Rug
reviews.review_text: This rug is not plush. It is very thin, but that is why it is washable. It works for me. It is non skid which is what I like about it. If you want something thicker I guess you could put a rug pad under it.

reviews.title: All purpose rug
reviews.review_text: This rug is soft, almost to the point where it's slippery. The pattern is beautiful but rug itself is very thin. In a bedroom I would recommend some padding.

Colors in picture are very deceptive. It is a lot lighter in color than described and a lot thinner. We just opened it up from the box and will use it for a few days before we decide if we are even keeping jt.

reviews.title: The camera lied
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this rug except the color. It's not really brown but a yellowish tan with brown highlights. My living space is extremely neutral but not ready to rebuild the color scheme around the yellow rugs.
I like the rug, but it is not as vibrant or bright in real life. The redish colors are more mauve. I wanted more redish colors. It just seems very dull compared to the pics.

Purchased this rug from Walmart. Received today and the rug is not as pictured , I wasn't expecting so orange picture looked more Grey and burgundy. The size I got was an 8x10. Quality is good. Just not the color I was expecting.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Disappointed to receive this pressure packed into A 24”X24” square box approximately 9” high. Still has crease marks from packaging. It should have been shipped rolled up!

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Never received this item the FedEx driver said he put it by my door, but it was not put by my door called neighbors. It was not put at the door. I have no picture of where he put it so I just lost all my money.

reviews.title: would recommend
reviews.review_text: i was looking for washable, non-skid rugs and these meet that criteria, plus they're a nice style of farmhouse distressed. good value as well. would reccommend.

reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
reviews.review_text: I was a little concerned it wouldnt be the quality i was hoping for with the price being so good. I took the chance and it has totally exceeded my Expectations and i love going home and enjoying how good it looks.

reviews.title: 👏 awesome
reviews.review_text: Get what u pay for. Not real thick but perfect to keep clean %26 vacume. Love the colorful design since it doesn't look worn or cheap but after using it for three months, the trafficked areas are slight fading. The price, washability, ease of vacuming %26 the colors I wanted far outweigh the fading that's noticed. The price was excellent %26 I'll gladly buy this type again.

reviews.title: Not a rug in any way, sorry.
reviews.review_text: This has a beautiful pattern that looks exactly as pictured. I just can't get over the texture. It's not a rug in any way. It feels like a plush blanket cut down to an 1/8th inch height if that makes sense. It's incredibly soft and dense, and I'm sure it's easy to throw in the washing machine. But just be aware it looks more like a blanket with a backing laying on your floor. I should've looked at it more online when ordering to see the material. It is not woven or looped in any way like a ruggable or similar types of washable rugs. So I'm sorry to say it clearly looks like like an imitation rug, and because of that appears cheap. It's too bad because the pattern is really pretty and subtle. If you don't mind it clearly being a thin mat you've got down on the floor, and obviously *not a rug* then it will likely work. It's just not what I was looking for.
excellent, and doesn't move when you vacuum. It is really soft and I love the colors
has several creases in the rug. will get out by vacuuming.

reviews.title: Falls short in size
reviews.review_text: It is not a true 6x9 it falls short :( Sad as I love the pattern.
Feels like a thin blanket or towel instead of a rug.

reviews.title: Good rug, good colors, good price
reviews.review_text: The rug is very nice and as advertised. Just what we were looking for at a good cost

reviews.title: waste of money
reviews.review_text: Low quality don't waste money to buy this

reviews.title: Great value.
reviews.review_text: Great for keeping hallway carpet clean.
The rug is too flimsy, washable of course, too thin
Love this rug stays in place doesn't move and easy to clean
Looked nothing like pictures online - huge color difference
I loved the look and feel of this rug, I believe it was a great addition to my home.
Beautiful colors Soft texture Great size Lightweight

reviews.title: Perfect hallway rug
reviews.review_text: Perfect, easy to vacuum, corners stay down

reviews.title: Looks going
reviews.review_text: Lower quality but looks nice for student dorm
i have my recliner sitting on this rug. perfect size.

reviews.title: Perfect rug!
reviews.review_text: Beautiful rug! I am currently using it my laundry room.
Beautiful, soft. It is perfect for dorm room, but definitely great for lifting room as well!
Wish it was a little thicker. But otherwise a great rug. Soft under your bare feet as well.

reviews.title: 4x6 Brown rug.
reviews.review_text: It's a little pricey for the quality. Using it in my kitchen does the trick.
This is extremely thin and not worth the money. No comfort at all in your feet. Hope I can return.

reviews.title: Happy
reviews.review_text: It's nice and washable. Thin of course. Will do the job. Looks very nice.

reviews.title: Good value!
reviews.review_text: It's thin but surprisingly stays in place. I do have to broom sweep it as my vac is too strong for it

reviews.title: Area rug
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this area rug! It is very soft too and cleans so easily with wiping up plus it can be put in the washer! Win win
My kitchen looks and feels nice with this rug. It's light weight which makes it easy to wash in the washing machine.

reviews.title: Vintage Brown Area Rug
reviews.review_text: Perfect rug… after ordering several elsewhere, I took a chance with this rug…. the color, size and softness was just what I was looking for!!!

reviews.title: Best Runner
reviews.review_text: I love the color and texture but somehow I ordered the wrong size and need to return for an exchange.

reviews.title: Definitely a Great Buy!
reviews.review_text: Very nice!! I ordered 3 different sizes for my kitchen and hallway. Simply lovely!! (I bought the brown.)

reviews.title: Great Rug
reviews.review_text: Serve the purpose for what I needed it for. Looks like it's going to be a perfect rug for my living room usage transportation safety group 1435.
Perfect long runner for my kitchen. I just wish it didn't come folded up. it was hard to get the creases out it should have came rolled up

reviews.title: Delivery
reviews.review_text: The delivery (non USPS). Was put in mail box rather than on porch,
Love the colors and it does not slip/move. Really great value for the quality.

reviews.title: Room Changer
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this rug! I loved it so much that I bought six total!

reviews.title: colors dont match picture
reviews.review_text: faded looking. colors dont match the picture
Beautiful rug. I have purchased several for my new house.
Great rug and the colors are true to description . So soft to walk on and my pups love it !

reviews.title: New home
reviews.review_text: Very soft! I would recommend purchasing a pad to go underneath
Pattern is nice size is good but quality is poor looks cheap
This rug is super soft and so pretty! The price was cheap for the size. I would recommend it to others.

reviews.title: Excellent quality rug
reviews.review_text: Matches perfectly, quality is very good. I plan to order a circle rug to go in the dining room to match the entry.

reviews.title: Soft, perfect color, texture, no rug pad needed
reviews.review_text: This was even better than I hoped. The rug is cheerful, sooo soft, and perfect for my entry way. I'm so glad I took a chance on it. I LOVE it.
It was what I was expecting. The only thing I don't like is, it won't lay down perfectly flat, always has a spot that puffs/rolls up a little
Beautiful rug for the price Very Well made. Put it in the hallway instead of a runner. Gorgeous, very happy!!!!!

reviews.title: soft and colorful
reviews.review_text: love the color and design, love the softness a pleasant surprise I should have gotten a 2x7 runner instead of the 2x6 but that was my mistake

reviews.title: Beautiful area rugs
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised with the quality. The description and online photos were exact to the actual product

reviews.title: Thin rug but soft
reviews.review_text: Nice soft rug but since thin will move so have to straighten it. Had in living room but moved to bedroom because it kept creasing. Design is beautiful

reviews.title: Like the carpet but dangerous texture
reviews.review_text: I like the carpet but too many faded spots, has an extremely slick feel making sliding on it a very serious issue, and it came folded, so far the folds are not relaxing. Not desiring to take to laundry just to flatten it out

reviews.title: Area Rugs
reviews.review_text: I ordered two of the rugs, different sizes, and they are so pretty. Just what I needed! When delivered, the rugs were folded, not rolled up, which was very nice because they laid better on the floor.

reviews.title: Perfect runner
reviews.review_text: The runner is very attractive looking in my kitchen. The shade of green is the perfect color as it brightens the room and warms it up. Highly recommend and be sure to put a rug pad under it.
you will love this area rug. i ordered a smaller one to replace another one. you will love it.

reviews.title: Wrinkly
reviews.review_text: Solid but comes folded so it's wrinkled and lumps won't straighten out

reviews.title: Attractive kitchen mat for a reasonable price
reviews.review_text: Good colour, not slippery , purchased on sale, very satisfied.

reviews.title: Perfect runner
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this rug, the size, the quality, the color and design. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.review_text: it's beautiful and SO soft. Definitely recommend!
This rug couldn't be more perfect. Stop thinking about it. Just start enjoying it.
Beautiful rug, but stains quickly, and stains do not cone out.
Looks so good with my sectional .Little thin but over all good quality.Didnt wash yet

reviews.title: Beautiful rug
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, soft oriental rug. I bought it for my new writing space and love it.

reviews.title: I don't like him. I'm happy with the purchase.
reviews.review_text: I don't like I'm not
i love it i wish I had bought a bigger size but everything is as described

reviews.title: Better than expected
reviews.review_text: Looks better in person than the picture. So happy I purchased this rug for the home office.

reviews.title: big and soft
reviews.review_text: its huge. nice color and soft material. thank you

reviews.title: Rug Review
reviews.review_text: I have 2 rugs like this and its design, texture and quality is worth it!!

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful! Wonderful rug. Soft, pretty, stays put.

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: True to color. Good quality. Backing is solid.

reviews.title: Rug
reviews.review_text: It's light weight and liquids dont soak through so cleaning is easy.
too thin and very slippery i have a matt under it and it still moves

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: I really like it. Haven't needed to wash it yet.

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.review_text: Very soft, light weight , easy to pick up and move by yourself, now wishing I got the 8x10 too.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: Beautiful rug I would recommend to anyone. It's also machine washable.

reviews.title: Lied about size
reviews.review_text: I ordered a 6 by 6 and they sent a 5 by 5 😡
Exactly the color I wanted. The right thickness. Very soft.
Love this rug. Pretty colors and feels good under my feet!
I love this rug and also love the fact that I can wash it. It is very pretty
size is good as a runner but quality could be improved as it is a trip hazard.

reviews.title: Very Soft
reviews.review_text: very soft, beautiful sage color with beiges in it. love it

reviews.title: Nice look at low cost.
reviews.review_text: Lays nice and feels good to the touch. Time will tell.

reviews.title: great rug
reviews.review_text: use this by our back door. has been great for the kids running in and out from the pool
Love how soft this area rug is. fits perfect, great quality highly recommend!

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: The color is exactly as expected. It looks beautiful in my entry hallway

reviews.title: A Folded 9x12 area rug
reviews.review_text: The rug came folded and squished into a box , And probably will never flatten out for a very long time. Rugs should be rolled not folded.
Well, only had them down a few days. Live the softness and design. Hope they truly wash good in machine.
It looked nice but the color could have been a little more vivid. Color was very light. Not as dark as the picture
One side of the rug was dark brown. The other side was a faded brown. It looks like it was worn out looked awful in my living room.
We love them. They are just enough that brings the room together as a cosy look we were looking for. Great value and look nice in our home.

reviews.title: Save your money
reviews.review_text: The only thing nice about this rug is they say it was machine washable? It was a nice size. The color was nice. The wrinkles in this rug were horrible impossible to get this rug to lay flat not show the wrinkles. It lasted 24 hours and I packed it away Would not recommend it

reviews.title: it's a blanket with rubber backing
reviews.review_text: p it isn't just that it doesn't feel like a rug you know with fibers and it stitched together. i didn't take theim from packaging 1) the box weighs a ton! its still where it was dropped. how would i ever get the widget/faux rug out of the box? Lst alone find a commercial washer large enough to wash the huges rug?

reviews.title: Easy to clean
reviews.review_text: It's thin but still very soft and washes very easily

reviews.title: Very pretty and soft rug
reviews.review_text: I love the colors on this rug. It is very soft and perfect for my bedroom. It shipped folded, so it is not super heavy and is easy to move around. Note that it is a thin rug, not plush and thick, but that was not a negative for me.

reviews.title: Excellent Rug
reviews.review_text: This rug is incredibly soft and easy to toss in the washer to clean it. The only thing I don't like is that it's so soft that it's a bit slippery to walk on with socks. The pros certainly outweigh the one con. I recommend this rug.

reviews.title: You won't be sorry
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this area rug. The design, the color, the soft texture and it's a perfect size for my living room. (6x9)

reviews.title: Good quality, color texture
reviews.review_text: I was worried when I saw some reviews but mine came in perfect! Very soft to walk on and no problem with wrinkles! Great price and value!!

reviews.title: Great Rug
reviews.review_text: Soft, looks good, easy to clean %26 perfect fit. Great addition to Whiskey Ranch Studio'z, THNX !

reviews.title: Happy with purchase
reviews.review_text: Very nice product. Would recommend.

reviews.title: ordered 1 billed and recieved 2
reviews.review_text: its not rocket science. but we will keep both.

reviews.title: soft
reviews.review_text: better than I thought, really soft to the toich

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.review_text: Nice for room change true to color, size , and shape.
Washable Rug means the Rug is very thin you definitely need cushion underneath Design is nice

reviews.title: Great area rug
reviews.review_text: Size is perfect for my room. I love the design and texture. Recommend!
it super think but the crease dont come out the rug

reviews.title: So pretty
reviews.review_text: Very good rug. It's so pretty and seems to be good quality.

reviews.title: Good Value
reviews.review_text: This rug feels so soft, we always get compliments frim guests.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.review_text: Looks just as pictured. Highly recommend!! We feel like we have a new living room.
